segments.text: This kitchen drawing catches my eye immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing there, polishing a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is running full blast, and the sink is full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling everywhere, soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, one foot in the puddle already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad; she could slip and hurt herself any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning to the kids, the boy is on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to get into the cookie jar, plate in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up too, like she's part of the plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool tips, he'll fall right onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to think of the accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a tidy garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't she watching them? This could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR
